analyzed: ārya tārā stutiḥ
ācārya candradāsa kṛtā
namaḥ tārāyai
sukha da cakra cāru cūḍāmaṇi rucira marīci saṃcaya
pracura śikhā pracāra paricumbita carcita caraṇa candrake
jagati carācare pi sācīkṛta cakita kṛpālu locane
stuti vacana upacāram ucita ācaratim racayāmi devi te
nakhara kaṭhora koṭi kuṭṭita kari kaṭa taṭa pāṭana utkaṭāḥ
pravikaṭa rudhira paṭala paṭa pālitāḥ aṭavī viluṇṭhakāḥ
vikaṭa saṭā aṭṭahāsa ghaṭita avaṭa taṭa ghaṭā nodbhaṭāḥ tvad juṣi
jhaṭiti yānti saṭinaḥ kuṇṭhāt api kuṇṭha śakti tām
malina mahā kapola tala vigalita madajala malana vihvalāḥ
skhalat ali jāla bahala kolāha lalita vilāsa lāsinaḥ
vicalita karṇa tāla pavana āhata lalita vilepa dhūlayaḥ
pathi na gajāḥ calanti kula śaila tulāḥ tava lānām a lālitāḥ
māruta ghāta jāta rabhasa ucchalat anala śikhā kadambaka
uddhata dhūmra dhūma dhūli dhuta baddha ghana andhakārakam
tvad nati nīti gatiḥ eti śamam bahuśas hutāśanaḥ
calita latā vitāna kuṭila udgama durgama gahana vartinaḥ

original: sapadi puro narasya tāreti manāgapi nāmadhāriṇaḥ |
analyzed: sapadi puras narasya tārā iti manāk api nāmadhāriṇaḥ
sphīta phaṇa ogha ghora phūtkāra parisphurat anala sphuṭa
sphurat uru visphuliṅga visphāriṇi phaṇini viṣam vinaśyati
kṣaṇa kṛta kopa kampa kara karṣita khara karavāla nirmala
vyatikara kara karavāla vikarāla mahā bala bhuja argalaḥ
prasthita pathika nikaṭa kaṭa vighaṭana paṭu rati niṣṭhura āśayaḥ

original: bhagavati bhaktivantumupasarpati tava na vane'pi taskaraḥ || 6 ||
analyzed: bhagavati bhakti vantum upasarpati tava na vane api taskaraḥ
narendra vīra huṅkāra kacagraha nigrahaḥ
graha grastaḥ iva rajju hiñjī rava jarjarita aṅga pañjaraḥ
pratipada khana khanāyamāna mukharīkṛta khara khara śṛṅkhalā āvali
s tvad caraṇa aravindam abhivandya sa nandati mukta bandhanaḥ
kala kala kalila lola kallola jala ullalat kālikā anilā
sphālita vipula bahala velā ākula kūla tamāla pallavāt
sa rabhasa makara nikara khara nakhara su dustara taḥ upi sāgarāt
tāriṇi tarala tāratara tārakam āturam etya rakṣasi  /
sūkṣma virāva sāra saragha utkara nirbhara ghora gharghara ghrāṇā
ghṛṇā aṅ aghri pāṇi asra visrīkṛta kvathita śarīra pañjarā
yad kṣaṇa mahā prasāda āveśa tvad praṇatā tāriṇi kāmarūpiṇā
tad kṣaṇa labdha lola kiraṇa maṇi kuṇḍala maṇḍita gaṇḍa maṇḍalā
yūka vikīrṇa śīrṇa paṭa karpaṭa kaṭi taṭa veṣṭana udbhaṭaḥ
saṃkaṭa peṭṭa pūra mātra arjana para pura piṇḍa tarkaṇaḥ

original: yadi tava nāmakaṃ hṛdi karoti hi rākṣasaikakaḥ
analyzed: yadi tava nāmakam hṛdi karoti hi rākṣasa ekakaḥ
prauḍha vadhū vidhūta cāmīkara khacita vicitra cāmaram
śrī candradāsa viracitā ārya tārāstutiḥ samāptā
